title: Spectator Out Loud: Jonathan Dimbleby, Katja Hoyer and Melissa Kite
description: On this week's episode, broadcaster Jonathan Dimbleby reads his diary (00:55), journalist Katja Hoyer reports on the German Greens and their poll surge (06:25) and Melissa Kite on why she's perfectly happy to stay in the country this summer (12:05).
itunes:author: The Spectator
dc:creator: The Spectator
